quality_assessment: Home page provides good introduction with clear navigation. Content is accurate and well-organized. Minor improvement needed for Quick Start example completeness.

issues.description: Quick Start example shows simplified syntax without context about when to use it vs full workflow structure
issues.current_content:
# Simplified syntax - commands as top-level array
# For full workflow structure, see workflows/complex-build-pipeline.yml
- shell: "cargo build"
issues.should_be: Should clarify that this simplified syntax is for simple workflows and reference the full syntax documentation
issues.fix_suggestion: Add a brief explanation that this is the simplified array syntax for simple workflows, and link to workflow-basics for full workflow structure with name, mode, and other fields.
issues.source_reference: workflow-basics/index.md should contain full syntax documentation

issues.description: Key Concepts mentions 'Validation' but doesn't explain what types of validation are available
issues.fix_suggestion: Expand the 'Validation' bullet to mention: workflow validation (structure/syntax), implementation completeness checking with the validate command, and runtime validation

issues.description: Variables description is dense and could be clearer for newcomers
issues.current_content: Variables: Dynamic values captured (json, lines, number) and interpolated using `${VAR}` or `$VAR` syntax with defaults, aliases, and nested field access
issues.should_be: Split into simpler concepts: variable capture from commands, interpolation syntax, and reference full documentation
issues.fix_suggestion: Simplify to: 'Variables: Capture output from commands and use throughout workflow with ${VAR} syntax. Supports nested fields, defaults, and environment variables.' Link to detailed variable documentation.

positive_aspects: Clear, compelling introduction explaining what Prodigy is and what it does
Well-organized navigation sections (Getting Started, Advanced Features, Operations)
Good use of MkDocs admonitions (tip callout for Production-Ready Features)
Accurate description of key capabilities (parallel processing, checkpoints, DLQ, git integration)
All internal links are valid and properly formatted
Mentions automated documentation as a key feature with proper cross-references
Quick Start example is functional and realistic (cargo build, test, clippy with AI-assisted fixing)
Balanced coverage of basic and advanced features without overwhelming newcomers
improvement_suggestions: Add a visual diagram showing the workflow execution lifecycle (would help visual learners)
Consider adding a 'Who Should Use Prodigy' section to clarify target audience
Add estimated time commitments for the different learning paths (e.g., 'Quick Start: 5 minutes', 'Tutorial: 30 minutes')
Include a brief 'Prerequisites' section mentioning Claude Code CLI, git, and YAML knowledge
Consider adding a concrete example of a use case scenario (e.g., 'Automate code review for 100 PRs')
